nodes.text: The GR-14 XT Plasma Core Blaster was a model of plasma blaster pistol available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The GR-14 XT Plasma Core Blaster was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Wild Space Explorer's Pack, which was released to the Cartel Market on September 1, 2015.
